overview: Before co-founding Nearbuy, Mark Jamtgaard spent the last five years at Inphi Corporation as a Systems Architect after their acquisition of Scinteraâ€™s 10G Electronic Dispersion Compensation division. Mark applied statistical signal processing techniques to high speed semiconductor projects. Previous to Inphi, Mark performed research on a position locating system using ultra-wideband technology at Aether Wire and Location. Mark was also a member of the founding team at 2Roam and was the companyâ€™s CTO. He holds a MSEE from Stanford University and a BSEE from Santa Clara University.
